text: Your officers are as close as your very kin, as much friends as they are subordinates. Keep them happy and they will keep you safe. Be aware of those worming in from without, not all carry your best intentions with them.

People of merit and talent flock to your borders, learning of your magnanimity and seeking sanctuary.  Your kindness wills you to open your doors to all comers, but be sure not to neglect those who have been at your side even during the hardest of times.
[[b]]Inner Circle[[/b]] can be increased by positive relationships and buildings
[[b]]Inner Circle[[/b]] can be decreased by assignments, negative relationships, and each character in faction.

No man is an island, a ruler cannot govern alone. A trusted cabal of loyal generals and officials must be nurtured, officers that you can trust explicitly. Many will use honeyed words to charm their way into your court, but be sure to hire and promote only those truly loyal.
• Inner Circle boosts the character pool size, salary, and satisfaction.
• Inner Circle is drained by the amount of characters in your faction and negative relationships with the faction leader.
• Inner Circle is gained by positive relationships and the unique building.
• Inner Circle is used to recruit new characters.

Honour your general with a feast and celebration in their name! Share cups of wine and stories, and freely chat not as lord and officer, but as kith and true friends.
